pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Implementation## Installpython >=3.5 requiredpip >= 19.0.0```pip install lor-deckcodes```## UsageEver expanding rich API with method to display cards conveniently```pythonfrom lor_deckcodes import LoRDeck, CardCodeAndCount# Decodingdeck = LoRDeck.from_deckcode('CEBAIAIFB4WDANQIAEAQGDAUDAQSIJZUAIAQCBIFAEAQCBAA')# list all cards with card format 3:01SI001list(deck)card = deck.cards[0] # instance of CardCodeAndCountcard.faction # SI/FR...card.card_id # 111card.set # 01# Encoding# These are equivalentdeck = LoRDeck(['3:01SI015', '3:01SI044'])deck = LoRDeck([ CardCodeAndCount.from_card_string('3:01SI015'), CardCodeAndCount('01SI015', 3)])# returns encoded stringdeck.encode()```
